Review.Contenu: does not work well, calls are cut several times. not a good service.

Review.Titre: Charge to much for Mobile Recharge.
Review.Contenu: Charge to much for Mobile Recharge.$1 or more... ;o(

Review.Titre: I want to be honest with my review
Review.Contenu: I want to be honest with my review . I purchased a subscription for 1000 minutes to call Colombia , this is the worst long distance phone  service I ever encountered , in a 10 minute call , the call drops 5 or 6 times and then it tells you have used 20 minutes when I only had the chance to talk 3 minutes .This is a skim , I do not know how this company have a 4 or 5 start review . I had $ 34.00 voice credit and they refused to return my money until I treat them with legal action , finally they refund me $20.00 ;I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE SERVICE .

Review.Titre: Suscribed myself for one of the plans
Review.Contenu: Suscribed myself for one of the plans. The month of January I was charged and they did not load minutes. It showed 0 balance and we didn’t even use it once.  Emailed them and no response. I canceled already. So no, I don’t recommend this service.

Review.Titre: Imposible to to use the unlimited calls to Colombia .
Review.Contenu: I suscribed on Dec ,19 ,2017 and tried to place calls to Colombia , but it was imposible to get connected . I complined to LlamaColombia and their answer was that it was somthing wrong with my equipment or that I did not have suficient  speed on my internet , so I tried my cellular and they said to reload the applicationon to the cellular and then to turn the cellular off and re-start it , wich I did and could not make a call .This is the second time I buy subscriptions for unlimited calls to Colombia and can't use it , always the same excuse my equipment does not work .

When I called to Colombia with your company the connection is really bad and all the time is cutting up or just finished the call after few seconds or few minutes when is longer. I am tired of this. Is a cheap service but is very low quality calls. Thank you
If you leave credits after your monthly subscription you will lost it!!! No recommend!!  It was way better with the  unlimited plan!!
Unlimited was 4000 minutes, now same price for 300 minutes big disappointment from loyal customers.
My debit card was declined ,I call the contacts never have answered The answered was nex day
Call getting lost continuously, or having to reconnect because other party does not listen.
Really poor conection when making calls, bad sound quality
Basura es una empresa deshonesta
Such a bad company
I wrote to your company whit no respond and interese from the company

Review.Titre: Very Confusing to make a call
Review.Contenu: The process to make the call was very confusing.It asked for a pin/ID number which I had no clue of what it was.. had to search to the website to figure it out.Then there’s the option to bypass the whole process of dialling a local number but that also was not available to everyone.The process is simply too complicated for people who simply want to make their call.I recommend you simplify this, or make the instruction process more clear.
Service is not great. Calls get disconnected constantly, or cannot hear. Many times calls don't connect at all.

For every 4 callas...3 has issues...sounds comes and go...you cant hear The other person .it is interrupted all the time...sometimes you see the message of weak conection..but thats not true.i live in europa..in lixembourg and here there are normal signals....it should be NASA internets to work well? Thats not an excus.

This company keeps raising the prices for the service it  provides. Pretty soon another company with a better or comparable services  will come along  and give  a  economic break to the people  who can not afford to keep paying such a hardship . Lllama Colombia just gives excuses whenever they want to increase their prices.

Review.Titre: It is just ok. Not worth five stars
Review.Contenu: Lots of static on the line on every call. Annoying recording to announce balance and remaining minutes, at the beginning of every call. That you only be announced when person is running low in minutes, or just with the balance display on the app is enough. Monthly plan should not be limited to only 300 minutes.

Review.Titre: great, convenience, easy to use. but many dropped calls and at times whole system is down.
Review.Contenu: This is probably the most convenient and easy way to make calls to colombia, beats buying cards. Is fast and easy to use. In the last couple of months I noticed a big change network is down calls are dropped and at times couldn't even make a call cause the whole system was down during the holidays.  I sure hope things get back to the way it used to be.

Review.Titre: After signed back after not using this…
Review.Contenu: After signed back after not using this service for a while on my first phone call on the minute 24  I got disconnected and I had to call again.  I signed for the monthly plan and I am trying it for 30 days. Because of the quality of the sound I give 3 stars. It could be better

This company advertises that they award 500 thank you points for referring a friend who creates an account. About a month ago I referred a friend and she created an account and bought minutes. I didn't see my 500 thank you points so today I called their support line. I was told that I did not qualified for the thank you points. This is in spite of the fact that I send Sandra the referral code and she used it to create the account and buy points. I feel that this company is falsely advertisements. Beware that if you refer someone, you are NOT going to be awarded thank you points.

It might be useful to allow the app to keep the phone active while the call is active. Also, it might help to allow the user to call via mobile network or wifi even if both are available. But then auto route the call with the PIN# and access number since this information is already in the app.

Review.Titre: If you buy the montly plan
Review.Contenu: If you buy the montly plan, be sure to cancel the plan before the end of the month, otherwise, The company will renew your service after a month and take away the minutes you have from the previous month. which is a malpractice on a business and reduce the credibility of the company. The rest, the service is good

Review.Titre: If we have minutes left by the time the…
Review.Contenu: If we have minutes left by the time the month expired, the company takes away those minutes. This is not good for the reputation of the company.  They should respect the minutes left and let them go forward to the next month.  Please take it in consideration

Review.Titre: Most calls go through with no issue
Review.Contenu: Most calls go through with no issue. Good sound quality and the person on the other side can hear me well. The only downside to their system is that you can't hang up with pressing a specific key combination, like ## like other services. You have to hang up and call again.

For the most part, I think this is a great service. I use it to call Colombia and love the fact you can customize and have quick access to numbers. I do have to say that it drops calls more often than I would expect and that is very annoying.

For calling Colombia, this service is excellent. Unfortunately I can't say the same when it comes to reloading wireless minutes for a phone in Colombia. I may try this feature again in the future and hope I have a better experience.

LlamaColombia is a very convenient way for me to reload my families cell phones in South America. I have used to for a few years now and have yet to experience mayor problems. I strongly recommended even though they do have a service fee.

There are several cases when the person I called did not hear me or I did not here him. Llama Colombia needs to improve this service call. There are other calls I make using whatsapp and the call is super.
